department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
full_summary:
# Government Tender Announcement

## Tender Details

* **Tender Reference:** 6D063-215511
* **Tender Title:** Supply and Installation of Windows
* **Publication Date:** November 22, 2023
* **Tender Closing Date:** December 20, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST

## Description of Requirement

The Public Health Agency of Canada (PHAC), Winnipeg, Manitoba, is seeking a contractor to provide skilled licensed labor, tools, equipment, supervision, and material for the supply and installation of interior and exterior glazing at The Canadian Science Centre for Human and Animal Health (CSCHAH).

## Key Requirements:

* The services will be provided on an "as required" basis.
* The estimated duration of the standing offer is 2 years, with 3 one-year option periods.
* It is anticipated that 1 firm will be awarded a standing offer.

## Additional Tender Information:

* This tender is premised on a competitive process, and the selected contractor will be required to provide the lowest price.
* The submission deadline for bids has been amended to December 20, 2023, at 14:00:00 EST. Bids received after this time may be declared non-responsive.
* All supporting documentation and bid submissions must be submitted prior to the closing deadline.

## Contact Information

* Contracting Authority: Dela Cruz, El (SPAC/PSPC)
* Contact Email: [el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:el.delacruz@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Notice URL: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/18082631?extsite=MTgwODI2MzFfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

In your notes, please clarify any areas of uncertainty. Thank you for your work on this! 

# 
# Clarifications:

## Areas of Uncertainty:

In the rewritten text, I clarified the following areas of uncertainty:

*   I changed the ambiguous phrase "Supply & Install Windows" to the more descriptive title "Supply and Installation of Windows".
*   I clarified the deadline for submitting bids in the "Additional Tender Information" section to avoid any confusion.
*   In the "Contact Information" section, I provided a clear and concise format for the contact information, including the contracting authority's name, email address, and notice URL.
